name: SortingHat
short: Have people sort themselves into roles
description: People use a command to sort themselves into one of several customizable roles. The role membership can be set to have a balanced distribution
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store any data or metadata about users.
install_msg: Use the command [p]SortingHat to get more info about how to use this cog.
author: chovin (irdumb)
